subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: As the cream of the 1994 rookie class, Jason Kidd and Grant Hill had a budding rivalry that some believed would reach Magic Johnson-Larry Bird proportions. But injuries have sidetracked Hill’s career.
snippet: As the cream of the 1994 rookie class, Jason Kidd and Grant Hill had a budding rivalry that some believed would reach Magic Johnson-Larry Bird proportions. But injuries have sidetracked Hill’s career.
